snippet.title: Education - Leiden University
snippet.description: Education at Leiden University. Leiden University's programmes are characterised by their focus on a specific discipline and a strong interaction between education and research.

snippet.title: Leiden University - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
snippet.description: Leiden University, located in the city of Leiden, is the oldest university in the Netherlands. The university was founded in 1575 by William, Prince of Orange, leader of the Dutch Revolt in the Eighty Years' War. The Dutch Royal Family and Leiden University still have a close relationship ...

snippet.title: The Leiden School | Online references | cyclopaedia.net
snippet.description: The Leiden school is a school of thought in linguistics that models languages as memes or benign neurological parasites,[1] and tries to use rigorous mathematical tools borrowed by analogy from biological evolution to model the origin and spread of language in general and specific languages in ...

snippet.description: On the 2nd of February 2014 the Leiden Debating Union will host the very first Leiden Schools.

snippet.title: Netherlands School Shooting Threat: Police Arrest Suspect In ...
snippet.description: THE HAGUE, Netherlands — Dutch police say they have arrested a suspect in an online threat to shoot a teacher and students that prompted authorities to close all the high schools in the city of Leiden.

snippet.title: Leiden Law School \- YouTube
snippet.description: The Leiden Law School is an internationally orientated law school offering a wide range of high quality law programmes, offered both in Dutch and English.

snippet.title: CWTS Leiden Ranking 2013
snippet.description: The CWTS Leiden Ranking 2013 measures the scientific performance of 500 major universities worldwide. Using a sophisticated set of bibliometric indicators, the ranking aims to provide highly accurate measurements of the scientific impact of universities and of universities' involvement in ...
